original_text: Then Pharaoh called Moses and Aaron to come to him. He said, ‘Pray to the Lord. Ask him to remove the frogs from me and from my people. Then I will let your people go. They can offer sacrifices to the Lord.’
korean_text: 바로가 모세와 아론을 불러 이르되 여호와께 구하여 나와 내 백성에게서 개구리를 떠나게 하라 내가 이 백성을 보내리니 그들이 여호와께 제사를 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Then Pharaoh called Moses and Aaron
Ask him to remove the frogs
from me and from my people.
Then I will let your people go.
They can offer sacrifices to the Lord.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 주께 제물을 바칠 수 있도록.'
